title: Advanced SQLi Bypass Techniques for WAF Evasion
author: Alex Chen
description: Explore advanced SQL injection techniques that bypass modern Web Application Firewalls. This comprehensive guide covers encoding methods, comment-based bypasses, and novel payload structures that evade detection by popular WAF solutions including Cloudflare, AWS WAF, and F5.

title: CyberChef Plus: Enhanced Recipe Automation
author: Security Team
description: A powerful extension to GCHQ's CyberChef that adds automated recipe discovery, batch processing capabilities, and API integration for forensics workflows. Streamline your data analysis with intelligent pattern recognition and automated decoding chains.
codePreview:
# Batch processing example
cyberchef-plus --recipe="base64_decode,rot13" --input-dir=./samples/ --output-format=json

# Auto-detection mode
cyberchef-plus --auto-detect --file=suspicious.txt --confidence=0.8

title: AI-Powered Threat Detection in Network Traffic
author: Dr. Sarah Kim
description: Research paper on implementing machine learning algorithms for real-time network intrusion detection. Covers LSTM networks, ensemble methods, and feature engineering for identifying APT traffic patterns with 97.3% accuracy and minimal false positives.
codePreview:
# Neural network architecture for traffic analysis
model = Sequential([
  LSTM(128, return_sequences=True),
  Dropout(0.2),
  LSTM(64),
  Dense(32, activation='relu'),
  Dense(1, activation='sigmoid')
])

title: Container Escape via Kernel Exploit CVE-2024-1086
author: Red Team Labs
description: Deep dive into the recent Linux kernel vulnerability allowing container escape. Includes exploitation methodology, affected versions, detection strategies, and mitigation techniques. Essential reading for DevSecOps and container security professionals.
